title: Sea Monster
description: A website for the company Sea Monster Crowdfunding that displays information about the games that they have funded.

title: CrewTube
description: A YouTube clone made with React and MaterialUI. The web application pulls data from RapidAPI's YouTube API to display videos correlating to any category of entertainment or anything the user searches.

title: TRVL
description: A front-end focused travel page made with React. The site features multiple tabs showcasing the various products and services provided by TRVL.

title: CP2077 Weather App
description: A Cyberpunk 2077-themed weather app built with React and Bootstrap. It uses OpenWeather API to tell users the forecast in any searched city.
